elements.name: User logs in with correct credentials

steps.name: I open up the application
I login as "admin" with password as "district"
I should be authenticated

elements.name: User logs in with bad credentials

steps.name: I open up the application
I login as "foo" with password as "bar"
I should be not be authenticated

description:
As as user of DHIS2
I want to be able to add and manage option sets.
name: Option set maintenance

elements.name: Add an option set

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an option set
I fill in all of the required fields for an option set with data:
I submit the option set
I should be informed that the option set was created
The current option set data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Add options to an option set

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an option set
that I have created an option set
that I specify some options to add:
I submit the option set
I should be informed that the option set was updated
The current option set data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Remove an option with no data associated

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to delete an option set
that I have created an option set
it has at least one option
I delete the option from the option set
I should be informed that the option set was delete
It was really deleted.

elements.name: Remove an option with data associated

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to delete an option set
that I have created an option set
it has at least one option with data associated
I delete the option from the option set
I should receive an error message equal to: The option can not be removed.

elements.name: Rename an option

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have created an option set
it has at least one option
I change the name of the option to Color114
I submit the option set
I should be informed that the option set was updated
The current option set data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Update code of an option

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have created an option set
it has at least one option
I change the code of the option to COLOR
I submit the option set
I should receive an error message equal to: The property code can not be changed.

description:
As as user of DHIS2
I want to be able to add and manage organisation units
name: Organisation unit maintenance

elements.name: Add an organisation unit

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I fill in all of the required fields with data:
I submit the organisation unit
I should be informed that the organisation unit was created
The returned data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Update added organisation unit

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I got the existing organisation unit to update
I fill in some fields to change with data:
I submit the organisation unit
I should be informed that the organisation unit was updated
The returned data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Assign a parent to an organsiation unit

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
an existing parent organisation unit exists
I fill in all of the required fields with data:
I should be able to assign the existing organisation unit as a parent
I submit the organisation unit
I should be informed that the organisation unit was created
The returned data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Update valid properties of an organisation unit with valid values

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I update an existing organisation unit
I provide a valid value: [-11.4197,8.1039], for a valid property: coordinates
I submit the organisation unit
I should be informed that the organisation unit was updated
The returned data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Update valid properties of an organisation unit with valid values

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I update an existing organisation unit
I provide a valid value: 1970-01-01T00:00:00.000, for a valid property: openingDate
I submit the organisation unit
I should be informed that the organisation unit was updated
The returned data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Update properties of an organisation unit with invalid values

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I update an existing organisation unit
I provide an invalid value: [-190.4197,8.1039], for a valid property: coordinates
I submit the organisation unit
I should receive an error message equal to: The coordinates value is not valid.

I update an existing organisation unit

elements.name: Define an end date for an organisation unit

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I update an existing organisation unit
I provide a previous closed date as 2015-01-30T00:00:00.000
I submit the organisation unit
I should receive an error message equal to: <errorMessage>.

elements.name: Define an end date for an organisation unit

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I update an existing organisation unit
I provide a later closed date as 2017-06-12T00:00:00.000
I submit the organisation unit
I should be informed that the organisation unit was updated
The returned data is the same as submitted.

elements.name: Translate an organisation unit name

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I translate the name of an organisation unit for pt as Organização 1
I select the same locale as I translated the organisation unit
I should be able to view the translated name.

elements.name: Translate an organisation unit name

steps.name: that I am logged in
that I have the necessary permissions to add an organisation unit
I translate the name of an organisation unit for es as Organización 1
I select the same locale as I translated the organisation unit
I should be able to view the translated name.
